conclusion: A skydiver jumps from a helicopter hovering at high altitude. The v-t (velocity-time) graph of his vertical movement in the air from the moment he jumps off the aircraft until he lands is shown.
The v-t graph shows the velocity of the skydiver increasing from 0 to 10 seconds.

premise: The velocity of the skydiver is increasing during this interval.
conclusion: Since the velocity is in the downward direction, the acceleration must also be in the downward direction.

premise: The acceleration is in the downward direction.
conclusion: Therefore, the acceleration direction is downward from 0 to 10 seconds.
